nodes.text: The Luudria system was a star system located in the Dalchon sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. The system was home to the creatures known as Luudrian lockjaws and also shared its name with the freighter Luudrian Star.
The Luudria system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square R-17.
